newsitem.title: UK: Lufthansa flies 25 cars to UK motor festival.
newsitem.headline: Lufthansa flies 25 cars to UK motor festival.

text.p: Lufthansa Cargo is flying a total of 25 exotic or vintage cars from the U.S. for the Goodwood Festival of Speed which runs from June 20-22.
Over the next two weeks Lufthansa is flying the cars in dedicated 747-200 freighters to Prestwick in Scotland where the first landed on Tuesday with seven cars from Atlanta.
The first flight carried various grand prix winning cars including a Ferrari never seen in the UK before.
The second flight is due on Thursday from Chicago with four cars including the Stanley Steamer making its its first ever appeartance in the UK and a Miller 4x4 which ran in six Indy 500s.
The remaining cars are due to arrive in Scotland next week with at least one flight from New York.
All the cars are being transported by road hauliers Sutherlands to the festival on the south coast of England. - Reuters Air Cargo Service Tel+44 171 542 7706 Fax+5017
